data.title: Diver Finds Over 2,750-Yr-Old Gold Coin in Bulgaria - It's believed to be the oldest gold coin ever discovered

'Shariah Police' ditch vests and change name: Salafists who caused outrage by mounting patrols in western Germany as "Shariah Police" have ditched their vests and changed their name, but pledged to continue to take action.

Pope marries couples who have cohabited, had children: Pope Francis married 20 couples on Sunday, some of whom had already lived together and had children, in the latest sign that the Argentine pontiff wants the Catholic church to be more open and inclusive.
